desc: Home Decor: throw pillow covers, woven blankets, indoor/outdoor waterproof floor mats. Fabrics include vintage florals, William Morris, French toile de jouy, Art Deco, Chinoiserie, modern exotic boho, abstract, tropical jungle. Cotton throw pillows & weatherproof outdoor pillows, garden cushions. Bespoke orders welcome

layout.text: Accent your garden seating with our beautiful range of luxury outdoor cushions that excel in performance and style. Look to designer garden cushions with striking patterns, beautiful colourways and premium designer materials to make a lasting impact.
